reviews.review: Играть в нее стоит, даже не смотря на последние изменения. Радует динамика и незатейливость. Играю, когда нужно немного отдохнуть и расслабиться.

I bought a new computer and installed the game, First time setup and the game thinks it's running but never registers with windows. With newer FPS games available to play I don't care enough to spend the 15 minutes it would take to troubleshoot...
Great for team and friendship building
1.6 конечно сейчас на высоте , для любителей если , в целом много игроков с программами играют.
it's a fun game to play with friends!
game is dead. too many hackers.
kind of boring didnt spend much time on it
wow i got stucked on sliver
Voltei a jogar desde os tempos de Lan House e não parei mais! Cs é vida!
It is a pure skill game and I would recommend it to my friends.

If you want a competitive, yet casual game with a horribly toxic fanbase, then this game is definitely for you. The perfect mixture of community servers, sweaty servers, and servers that don't have a good tick rate whatsoever to make it virtually impossible to do anything except lag out and/or quit.
una poronga, me arruino la vida 10/10

The ranking system is absolute trash, if you aren't a god at FPS games don't even give it a shot. You'll get stuck in silver and have to deal with 1. Hacker and Cheater (which are extremely common) 2. Smurfs everywere.
The community is completely toxic and will accuse you of cheating if they are the ones cheating. 
The Devs don't give two fucks about anyone that plays because they're making ludicrous bucks off of crates and keys.
Just save yourself some time fam and don't get it.
Awesome game. Fun to play with friends. Just facing a few bugs after the new shattered webs update.

Best game for Multiplayer.Where i found some best unknown friends :)
i just don't love it because of MtherFker Hackers and VALVE doesn't care  about it,so
